CustomField.description: NOKIASC-31152 - changing the alias to fetch name of service contract Owner
CustomField.formula: IF(BEGINS(Owner:User.Id, '005'), Owner:User.FirstName +" "+Owner:User.MiddleName+" "+ Owner:User.LastName , (IF(BEGINS(Owner:User.Id, '00G'), Owner:Queue.QueueName, 'ID should start with either 005 or 00G') ))
CustomField.label: CH Service Contract Owner
